page.description: Populate a collection from a table.
page.original:
&ltCOLLECTION>.FROM_TABLE() Syntax &ltCOLLECTION>.FROM_TABLE( Table_Name as C, Key_Field_Name as C, Data_Field_Name as C ) ArgumentDescription Table_NameThe fully specified table name with drive and path. Key_Field_NameThe name of the field that provides the collection key value. Data_Field_NameThe name of the field that provides the collection element value.
Description The &ltCOLLECTION>.FROM_TABLE() method populates a collection with data from a table. Example dim customers as U dim t as P dim filename as C t = table.open("customer") filename = t.filename_get() customers.from_table(filename, "customer_id", "lastname") ? customers.get("00000003") = "Rebo"
See Also Collection Methods
